title: Use SVG logo, fix hero image + headline styling, update rating, embed Google Map, remove Facebook icon

requirements.text: Replace the text-only site logo in the header with the provided SVG logo from https://utthan.vercel.app/assets/images/logo.svg, ensuring the logo can be sized appropriately for desktop/mobile and its colors can be adjusted to match the site’s strict brand palette.

quotes:
I want you to use logo (https://utthan.vercel.app/assets/images/logo.svg)

its an SV image so that you can change colors and size as per your preference

acceptanceCriteria: Header shows the SVG logo instead of the text-only “Utthan / Physiotherapy Clinic” logo block
Logo is visible and crisp on mobile and desktop and does not overflow the header layout
Logo styling (size/color) is controlled in-app (not hard-coded in the remote asset) and matches the site’s brand palette

requirements.text: Update the Home page hero image to fully replace the current spine hero image with the provided image https://utthan.vercel.app/assets/images/back_pain.png, using a background-removed cutout version of that image as the hero visual.

quotes:
also use this https://utthan.vercel.app/assets/images/back_pain.png as a hero image (remove the background and use it)

2 - yes fully replace the current image

acceptanceCriteria: Home page hero no longer references /assets/generated/spine-hero-v2.dim_1600x900.jpg
Hero uses a background-removed version of back_pain.png and displays correctly at common breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop) without distortion
Hero image loads without 404s in production build

requirements.text: Adjust the Home page hero headline typography for the text “Experience personalized physiotherapy treatment that gets you back to doing what you love” to be less bold and include increased letter spacing so it does not look congested, while keeping strong readability/contrast.

quotes:
"Experience personalized physiotherapy treatment that gets you back to doing what you love"

This text looks conjusted I want to have a bit lesser bolder versoin of it and should have some letter spacing

3 - yes headline

acceptanceCriteria: Hero headline font weight is reduced from the current bold styling and letter-spacing is increased noticeably
Headline remains readable with sufficient contrast against the hero background across breakpoints
No other headings across the site are unintentionally changed by this adjustment

requirements.text: Update the site’s displayed Google rating and review count to show 4.9 rating from 147 Google reviews wherever the aggregate rating is shown (including the Home page trust badge and LocalBusiness schema aggregateRating).

quotes: my ratting is 4.9 by 147 Google reviews

acceptanceCriteria: Home page trust badge shows “4.9 Rating” and “147 reviews” (or equivalent wording)
LocalBusiness JSON-LD aggregateRating outputs ratingValue "4.9" (or 4.9 formatted to one decimal) and reviewCount 147
No UI still shows the old computed values derived from the placeholder REVIEWS array

I want map to be present on the site

Map is responsive (fills available width, maintains reasonable height, no horizontal overflow on small screens)

requirements.text: Remove the Facebook social icon/link from the site UI and ensure no Facebook URL remains in the canonical clinic social links data used by the footer/social components.

quotes: also we are not on facebook so please remove the facebook icon

acceptanceCriteria: Footer no longer renders a Facebook icon/link
No other page/header/footer renders a Facebook icon/link
CLINIC_INFO (or the shared clinic social links source) no longer contains an active facebook entry that could be rendered elsewhere

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).
Do not modify immutable hook entry points: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx.
Keep backend as a single Motoko actor; do not add additional backend services.
nonGoals: Do not add a contact form or email-sending backend; continue using mailto where applicable.
Do not introduce third-party auth providers beyond Internet Identity.
Do not change site routing/IA beyond what is necessary to implement the requested UI updates.

required: Background-removed cutout of a person with lower back pain, transparent background (hero-back-pain-cutout.dim_1400x1400.png)
